title: Daughter of Exile
description: Fourteen years ago Lord Challo Hashan was exiled from court, and his daughter Angarred grew up wild and unschooled. But when her father is killed, she has to go to court to demand justice for him, unsure who there is her friend and who an enemy. What is the magician, Mathewar, hiding? What about Lord Snoppish, a man her father hated? When war breaks out, she has to decide whose side she is on.
author: Isabel Glass
